title: Trailer Wiring Install: CURT 56046 on 2007 Chevrolet Impala
description:
This video depicts the installation of the CURT 56046 T-Connector on a 2007 Chevrolet Impala.

Install Sheet:
https://www.curtmfg.com/masterlibrary/56046/installsheet/CME_56046_INS.PDF

Application Coverage:
2006 - 2012

Special Notes:
All Steps must be followed to ensure correct function of the T-Connector.  To verify proper installation once installed, test by connecting a test light or properly wired trailer.

Warning:
-This video is intended to be used as reference. Please refer to print instructions for complete installation information.
tags: CURT Receiver Hitch, trailer hitch, towing, how to install, curt 56406, Chevy Impala
